title: Chicken Little's
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Flat shopping bag. Spatter design black on white overall on front, sides and verso. Blue spatter on front of bag. State of California outlined on front with two red arrows pointing to area of San Francisco and Los Angeles. Top edge of bag pinked (crimped). Lower right, Chicken Little's printed in blue. Verso: Chicken Little's in blue lower left corner.
name: Shopping bag
